title: Super Easy Cabbage Stir Fry Recipe
description: This easy cabbage stir fry with garlic, soy sauce, and Chinese rice wine is cooked in a wok until perfectly tender yet crunchy for a superb side dish.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Side Dish Vegetables Cabbage Super Easy Cabbage Stir Fry 4.6 (93) 74 Reviews 11 Photos This cabbage stir fry is very simple to make. I like to keep the ingredients to a minimum and season with just soy sauce, garlic, and Chinese rice wine to let the natural sweetness of the cabbage shine. Submitted by iken Updated on January 16, 2025 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 11 11 11 11 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 5 mins Total Time: 15 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 1 tablespoon vegetable oil 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 pound shredded cabbage 1 tablespoon soy sauce 1 tablespoon Chinese cooking wine (Shaoxing wine) Directions Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium heat. Stir in garlic and cook until it begins to brown, 3 to 5 seconds. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir in cabbage until coated in oil; cover the wok and cook for 1 minute. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Pour in soy sauce; cook and stir for another minute. Increase heat to high and stir in Chinese cooking wine. Cook and stir until cabbage is tender, about 2 minutes more. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Serve hot and enjoy! DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS  I Made It Print 158 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 65 Calories 4g Fat 7g Carbs 2g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 65 % Daily Value * Total Fat 4g 4% Saturated Fat 1g 3% Sodium 270mg 12% Total Carbohydrate 7g 3% Dietary Fiber 3g 10% Total Sugars 4g Protein 2g 4% Vitamin C 42mg 47% Calcium 49mg 4% Iron 1mg 3% Potassium 208mg 4% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Super Easy Cabbage Stir Fry 01 of 11 Photo by  DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS  02 of 11 Photo by  JoyfulMixer9415 04/03/2024 A keeper! Great flavors Easy to follow I actually used this recipe as an addition to a stir fry I had already planned - because I hadn’t cooked/sautéed cabbage before & I was simply looking for some basic instructions…it was so simplistic and DELICIOUS!! THIS became the base of my stir fry!! 03 of 11 Photo by  lutzflcat 11/13/2023 We enjoy stir-fried/sauteed cabbage, but we thought the seasoning on this was weak. I didn’t have any Chinese cooking wine, so I sub’d dry sherry which worked out fine. I ended up doubling the soy sauce and sherry, and added some sliced bell pepper for a pop of color. Turned out pretty well, served with grilled, marinated flank steak.. 04 of 11 Photo by  DREGINEK 06/24/2023 Really good and paired well with Asian Orange Chicken I made from this site. I didn’t have the specified wine so I used 1/2 TBLS of rice wine vinegar and 1 TBLS of apple cider vinegar. Debated about adding some thinly sliced onions to the sauté but didn’t. I think I will next time. Super easy side dish! Thanks iken! 05 of 11 Photo by  Keita 11/24/2022 Kept it simple. Used Sesame seed oil, garlic, red pepper flakes, onion, black pepper. Stir Fried and topped with Crunch Garlic with Chili Oil for flavor. Bam! I recommend S&B Umami Topping Crunchy Garlic with Chili Oil. 06 of 11 Photo by  Stephanie J 05/17/2020 07 of 11 Photo by  Angela White 06/11/2018 08 of 11 Photo by  Takakishi Hatake 04/19/2018 09 of 11 Photo by  aa4knl 09/16/2014 10 of 11 Photo by  TTV78 06/16/2010 Simple & delicious! We loved this side dish w/ our Burmese curry & steamed rice dinner. The flavors of the ingredients are well balanced w/ the sweetness of the cabbage. I used 1/2 medium sized cabbage & it was perfect. Wouldn't change a thing about this recipe! Will definitely use again. Thanks so much for sharing! 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Creamed Cabbage 240 Ratings Fried Cabbage with Bacon, Onion, and Garlic 1,320 Ratings Homemade Sauerkraut 78 Ratings Cabbage Curry 33 Ratings Indian Fried Cabbage 15 Ratings Cabbage Steaks 166 Ratings Chef John's Braised Red Cabbage 95 Ratings Our 12 Best Cabbage Side Dishes Ready in 30 Minutes or Less Southern Fried Cabbage 756 Ratings Roasted Cabbage 300 Ratings Braised Cabbage 44 Ratings Easy Fried Cabbage 8 Ratings Mild Thai Beef with a Tangerine Sauce 6 Ratings Irish Fried Cabbage with Bacon 91 Ratings Sauteed Cabbage and Peppers 39 Ratings Ethiopian Cabbage Dish 937 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
